message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a bargain price of $150.  I think it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $90 for it.
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but the quality of this product is exceptional. How about we meet in the middle at $130?
I'm still not sure if I can go up to $130. How about we try $110? I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
